channel.title: Custom transfer and Nulls
channel.description:
Hello,
1) If i download someone's model and wanted to put it on my server would i just download drag the WinRaR things to the Model files and replace all the one's befor with the new ones?
Or will it just *beep* up my server stuff?
2) im on my Client useing Hamachi (like that doesnt matter) Anyway when i go to shops in a Client there like loads or few Null's... And when i go into Silab Client normal i dont get any?
Help me on one of them please. would be nice :)

item.title: Custom transfer and Nulls
item.dc:creator: @lordante lordante
item.description:
@lordante wrote:

EatU4Dinner do you have to replace the same number in Models for the new one you downloaded that all i needed to know.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom transfer and Nulls
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

ok umm. heres an example of ints.

if(i == 1949){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 1988; class8.anInt181 = 700; class8.anInt190 = 1100; class8.anInt198 = 650; class8.anInt204 = 1148; class8.anInt169 = 5; class8.anInt194 = -25; class8.anInt165 = 1987; class8.anInt200 = 1987; class8.aString170 = "Fighter Hat "; class8.aByteArray178 = "A penance fighter hat.".getBytes(); }

class8.anInt174 = 1988;

is the drop model. so when you download the 2 gzipped models, 1 will be the wear model and one will be the drop model. the drop model will go here class8.anInt174 = 1988;

class8.anInt165 = 1987; class8.anInt200 = 1987;those 2 are the wear id. you put the other gzipped number there.

this was probaly confusing but i do suggest finding a tutorial.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom transfer and Nulls
item.dc:creator: @lordante lordante
item.description:
@lordante wrote:

Ok ty for the Null one. (hope it works)
I just need the Model comment now.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom transfer and Nulls
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

the items in your source arent added to your client. or dont match the clients id. so try going into class8.java in your client folder. search the item and then go into shops.cfg and change the id.

Read full topic
